1020630.name: Amaze VR - Rom Com Pack 2
1020630.description:
New Amaze VR Interactive Movie DLC Pack


DLC Pack includes two romantic comedy 180° 3D VR Movies at a discounted price.

• Naughty Or Nice (143 mins): Jason plans to propose to his girlfriend, Dena. That is before he learns he must ask her family’s permission first. Now, he has to win their hearts or lose the girl.

• Promotion (206 mins): Tommy is up for his dream job. The only catch is, there is another candidate being considered, Sam Miller, and she might just be his dream girl…

Enjoy “Choose Your Own Adventure” experiences where you decide the course of the story!
1020630.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
